markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />Interact ([illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) **Frequency** once per week;   **Effect** You spill the nightmarish contents of the cauldron onto the ground and choose one creature whose nightmare is stored in your cauldron. A nightmare copy of the chosen creature springs to life from the bubbling pile of horror. The cauldron casts [_duplicate foe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=93) on the target, ignoring the range restriction, and the target automatically fails its saving throw. All enemies within 20 feet of the cauldron are subjected to a [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) spell (DC 35). All other nightmares stored in the cauldron are lost. The cauldron becomes totally inert and can't be used again for 1 week.
name: Interact (illusion, visual)
